title: Restaurant Vegetariano El Pimenton
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Juice bar, Take-out, Peruvian Amazon
description: Simple family-run vegetarian restaurant around the corner from the entrance to the Ucayali River Hotel. Comfortable indoor seating, daily menu from 6-9 soles including a main course and soup. Uses local Amazon herbs, vegetables, and river plants. Vegans please inquire about options and inform HappyCow.
